function Start(idActor, idActorDetector)

	Hydra.ActorPlayConversation(convAnetaScared, idSelf, idAnetaField)
	Hydra.QActorAnim(idAnetaField, "AnimKey_Talk_Scared")

function Start(idActor, idActorDetector)

	local idAnetaFollower = Hydra.QuestGetFollower("QST_Hawe_TheHeretic_Aneta_Follower")
	
	if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idAnetaFollower) then
		Hydra.ActorDisableAI(idAnetaFollower)
		Hydra.QuestFollowerTakeOwnership(idAnetaFollower)
		Hydra.ActorPlayConversation(convAnetaHome, idSelf, idAnetaFollower)
		Hydra.QActorMoveToLocationDynamicSpeed(idAnetaFollower, idAnetaHome, "NPC_Run", true)
		Hydra.QActorFaceSameAsActor(idAnetaFollower, idAnetaHome, true)
		Hydra.QActorDelete(idAnetaFollower)
	end
	
	idVeraClone = Hydra.CreatePersonalClone(idVeraSitting, true)
	
	if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idVeraClone) then
		Hydra.QActorWait(idVeraClone, 0.5)
		Hydra.QActorClearAnimSetOverride(idVeraClone)
		Hydra.QActorFaceSameAsActor(idVeraClone, idVeraStanding)
		Hydra.QActorSetAnimSetOverride(idVeraClone, "NPC_Idle_Stand_Sick_Cough")
		Hydra.QActorDeleteNPCClone(idVeraClone, 0, idVeraStanding)
	end
	
end

function Start(idActor, snoQuest)
end

function Start(idActor, idActorDetector)

	idVassClone = Hydra.CreatePersonalClone(idVassCave, true)
	Hydra.SetPlayerVariableFlag(idSelf, "QST_Hawe_TheHeretic_VassCaveVisibility")
	Hydra.QActorWait(idVassClone, 0.5)
	Hydra.QActorMoveToLocationDynamicSpeed(idVassClone, idVassCaveRunToLoc, "NPC_Run", true)
	Hydra.QActorFadeAndDelete(idVassClone, 0.5)

end

end

function Start(idActorNPC, sConversation, idActorPlayer)

	idVeraClone = Hydra.CreatePersonalClone(idVeraStanding, true)
	if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idVeraClone) then
		Hydra.QActorWait(idVeraClone, 1)
		Hydra.QActorFaceActor(idVeraClone, idChairLoc)
		Hydra.QActorSetAnimSetOverride(idVeraClone, "NPC_Idle_Sit_Chair_toSickStand_Offset")
		Hydra.QActorDeleteNPCClone(idVeraClone, 0, idVeraSitting)
	end
	
end

function Start(idActor, idActorDetector)

	Hydra.ActorPlayConversation(convVassCaveBark, idSelf)
	Hydra.MinimapAddPingForPlayer(idVassCave, idSelf, 4, true)
	Hydra.EventSend("QST_Hawe_TheHeretic_VassCaveBark", idSelf)
	
end

function Start(sEventName, idActor, nUserParam)
end

function Start(idActor, idActorDetector)

	if (Hydra.ActorHasItemByName(idSelf, idDaisyItem)) == false then
		local idAnetaFollower = Hydra.QuestGetFollower("QST_Hawe_TheHeretic_Aneta_Follower")
		if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idAnetaFollower) then
			Hydra.ActorDisableAI(idAnetaFollower)
			
			if Hydra.IsPlayerVariableSet(idSelf, "QST_Hawe_TheHeretic_Plant01BarkHeard") == false then
				Hydra.ActorPlayConversation(convFlower, idSelf, idAnetaFollower)
				Hydra.SetPlayerVariableFlag(idSelf, "QST_Hawe_TheHeretic_Plant01BarkHeard")
			end
			
			Hydra.QActorMoveToLocationDynamicSpeed(idAnetaFollower, idAnetaFlower01, "NPC_Run", true)
			Hydra.QActorFaceSameAsActor(idAnetaFollower, idAnetaFlower01, true)
		end
	end	
end

function Start(idActor, idActorDetector)

	local idAnetaFollower = Hydra.QuestGetFollower("QST_Hawe_TheHeretic_Aneta_Follower")
	if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idAnetaFollower) then
		Hydra.QActorStopAllQueuedActions(idAnetaFollower)
		Hydra.ActorEnableAI(idAnetaFollower)
	end
end

function Start(idActorPlayer, idItem)

	Hydra.SetPlayerVariableString(idSelf, "QST_Hawe_TheHeretic_AtWhichPlant", "Flower01")
	Hydra.IncrementPlayerVariableNumeric(idSelf, "QST_Hawe_TheHeretic_PlantsPicked", 1)
	
	-- If the player still has plants to pick, immediately re-enable follower mode for Aneta
	if Hydra.GetPlayerVariableNumericValue(idSelf, "QST_Hawe_TheHeretic_PlantsPicked") < 3 then
		local idAnetaFollower = Hydra.QuestGetFollower("QST_Hawe_TheHeretic_Aneta_Follower")
		Hydra.QActorStopAllQueuedActions(idAnetaFollower)
		Hydra.ActorEnableAI(idAnetaFollower)
	end

end
